content:
Hi all,

There was some discussion in #t-compiler/help about the possibility of adding regex support to libtest. See this conversation and the Github issue. There was some discussion on whether or not this feature would be worth the complexity to add, so for this topic I would like to discuss the following:

  1. Do people think this feature is worth adding? It is clear there is interest when looking at the Github issue, but is it worth the extra complexity of adding regex to libtest?
  2. If it's clear that the extra complexity is not worth it, would it be possible to add regex support to an external crate so that it's optional? I'm not really into how libtest is used internally, but I have some feeling that wouldn't be easy.

If anyone has any other thoughts on the issue, I'd like to hear those as well!
